body:
Have you ever used Cleverbot? And it was acting weird? Tell me right here what happened.

This is what happened to me. i kept on spamming "Have You Heard of Rokillers" over and over and over again. Until it said "From Hell.....I am ben". i just stood there. Scared.

If you don't know what Ben is here you go https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uWOnvuHI31U

Hmm...

Me: Are you an idiot?

interesting...

replies.body:
...

User: Hey.

Cleverbot: Sup?

User: What up.

Cleverbot: The sky.

User: Ah.

Cleverbot: Indeed.

User: Heh.

Cleverbot: Meh.

User: W.

Cleverbot: Yes?

User: Wait wat.

Cleverbot: Wait what??

Cleverbot: Tristan.

User: Who is that.

Cleverbot: Me.

User: Well.

Cleverbot: Well what?

User: Alright then.

Cleverbot: Alrighty right then.

Cleverbot: Restart what?

replies.body:
I am human...
 I have an android.If I have an android too, then how many do we have?
Two androids...
Android is better than iOS.Its true.You're right. It's not necessarily rude. But tact is just as important as truth in conversation.

Clever Bot knows the truth <3
